alert.note: Alert for Manua (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued February 20 at 6:08PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 9 PM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rain. WHERE...Manu`a. WHEN...Through 9 PM. IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 603 AFIAFI ASO GAFUA FEPUARI 20 2023 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 9... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa. NOFOAGA...Manu`a. TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 9 po nanei. AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.
